TouchFramework.SupportedActions

TouchFramework.SupportedActions Class Reference

Handles bitwise support for TouchAction enums to allow containers to easily specify the multiple behaviours they support. More...

Detailed Description

Handles bitwise support for TouchAction enums to allow containers to easily specify the multiple behaviours they support.
